funding-source.institution: This research was financially supported by the Canadian International Development Research Centre (IDRC) and the Australian Centre for International Agricultural Research (ACIAR) (INSFEED - Cultivate Grant No: 107839-001),German Ministry of Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ) through the Deutsche Gesellschaft f&#x00FC;r Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) & ENTONUTRI &#x2013; 81194993, WOTRO Science for Global Development (NWO-WOTRO) (ILIPA &#x2013; W 08.250.202), through the International Centre of Insect Physiology and Ecology (icipe). We also gratefully acknowledge the icipe core funding provided by UK Aid from the Government of the United Kingdom; Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida); the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC); Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ), Germany, and the Kenyan Government.
